messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: The General Election has now been called. It will be on Thursday 6th May and I am writing to you to ask you to vote for me as your MP. But before I introduce myself, let me tell you about something that I have learned about you. I have learnt that NO one political party owns the people of Brighton Pavilion. I have learnt that the voters of this constituency are independently minded people who seriously think about their politics before they vote.

messages.title: It's time for a change...
messages.content: The trust and integrity... Politics has rightfully taken a bashing in the last year or so. The usual party types have had their chance and have made a real mess of things. They seem to have lost any sense of reality. That is why despite not being a professional politician, unlike the other party candidates, I have decided to have a go myself.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: As a trained nurse, I have a great love and affection for the institution of our NHS. As your MP I will be a strong voice seeking to defend the NHS from those who would seek to undermine it.
Local mums have already spoken to me about their concerns about their education provision. The education of our children will be a priority for me.

We need to finally resolve the city's schools crisis - giving our children the very best start - if the Council won't - the Government must. I will oppose the massive Government wastage of the Trident and ID Card schemes. I will do everything I can to fight climate change and take the difficult decisions to tackle it. I want to see fairer taxes and the burden on ordinary families to lift make sure the richest pay their fair share.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a trained nurse, I have a great love and affection for the institution of our NHS. As your MP I will be a strong voice seeking to defend the NHS from those who would seek to undermine it.

images.caption: Berni Millam ...a strong voice for Pavilion residents

leaflet.additionalNotes: We're funded solely by small local donations - the only main local political party which is.
